name: The Weight of a Soul
description:
You are the goddess of life and death.

The spirits of the dead come before you to be judged.

The only reliable way to do so is to weigh their hearts against symbolic counterweights, which allow you to guess at how they lived their lives.

What kind of judge will you be?
